• View On GitHub

    • hello-js-action-super-alu0100901214

    Project maintained by ULL-ESIT-PL-2021 Hosted on GitHub Pages — Theme by mattgraham

    Releases

    1.0.9

    Throw HttpClientError instead of a generic Error from the <verb>Json() helper methods when the server responds with a non-successful status code.

    1.0.8

    Fixed security issue where a redirect (e.g. 302) to another domain would pass headers. The fix was to strip the authorization header if the hostname was different. More details in PR #27

    1.0.7

    Update NPM dependencies and add 429 to the list of HttpCodes

    1.0.6

    Automatically sends Content-Type and Accept application/json headers for <verb>Json() helper methods if not set in the client or parameters.

    1.0.5

    Adds <verb>Json() helper methods for json over http scenarios.

    1.0.4

    Started to add <verb>Json() helper methods. Do not use this release for that. Use >= 1.0.5 since there was an issue with types.

    1.0.1 to 1.0.3

    Adds proxy support.
